lexUnit.name: brimming.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: full to the point of overflowing.

sentence.text: He handed a brimming glass to the imperturbable Marx .
A holding camp designed for 480 boat people has been brimming with more than 1,000 .
OLD BRUSSELS : Chez Jean has been serving steaming pots brimming with mussels and other Brussels specialties since 1931 .
After a brief wait and an exchange of pleasantries with Renee , Yanto carried the two brimming mugs back out into the sun and joined Selwyn on the bench .
I was welcomed in through the front door almost before it was opened , and settled down in front of a Victorian stove that was brimming with hot coals .
Their bowls will be brimming , they will head the queue for the sprat of meat or fish that floats in the soup gruel .
Lighting up the cigarette from the stub of the previous one he tossed the butt into the brimming blue ashtray .
The old man toasted him with his brimming glass .
Volker 's mother had been a big , fat woman partial to a plate of coarse regional sausages doused in hot mustard and a brimming tankard of rich dark beer .
There was a constriction in her throat and her eyes were brimming with tears .
Greve in Chianti is some 18 miles from the city -- a town where the houses smile out at you above colourful balconies brimming with geranium pots .
Books , horses and a garden brimming with flowers are the lasting impressions of Lavender Cottage .
Anna held out a spoon brimming with caviar and pushed it towards Romanov as if she was trying to feed a reluctant baby .
Tolonen sat at his daughter 's bedside , his eyes brimming with tears .
Amanda 's gaze was surprised from the ceiling , and she looked across with brimming eyes .
We could all have rivers brimming with salmon if you wish .
On the top shelf was a silver tureen brimming with strawberries .
He picked up a brimming wine goblet from the small table beside him .
A soak in a hot tub , brimming with scented foam , was about the only thing that could soothe her wounded spirits .
Pots and containers brimming over with flowers or foliage are an indispensable garden feature particularly for adding that finishing touch to patios .
He had a brimming goblet of wine in one hand , the other up the skirt of the dancing girl who had caught my eye earlier .
Older children might prefer the pirate 's treasure chest brimming over with stolen loot , or the sophisticated speed cruiser and space rocket .
